mapper.sql: id, title, checkboy, flag, author, Nselect, Nimage, gmt_create, gmt_modified

insert into advisory
id,
title,
checkboy,
flag,
author,
Nselect,
Nimage,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
article,
Ncause,
intro,

mapper.update:
update advisory
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkboy = #{checkboy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Nselect = #{nselect,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Nimage = #{nimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
article = #{article,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
Ncause = #{ncause,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
intro = #{intro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
